query:
SELECT language, COUNT(*) as count, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT category) as categories
FROM faq_items 
GROUP BY language 
ORDER BY language;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute SELECT language, COUNT(*) as count, 
       COUNT(DISTINCT category) as categories
FROM faq_items 
GROUP BY language 
ORDER BY language;
